description:
A super-soft hoodie to make fall a little cozier. With an instantly familiar profile, the CO-Z pullover feels like an old favourite from day one. The soft and warm high pile fleece holds onto warm air, wicks away moisture, and gives life to more than 20 single use plastic bottles.

  • Thick recycled polyester sherpa fleece has a great warmth to weight ratio and dries quickly
  • Woven recycled nylon overlays add durability and wind resistance in high-wear areas
  • DWR finish on woven overlays
  • Deep hood has a soft fleece lining and woven weather resistant outer layer
  • Zip-up front placket lets you seal in warm air
  • Kangaroo pocket gives you a place to stash your phone and warm your hands
  • Drawcord at the hem and ribbed cuffs keep the elements from creeping in
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
  • Relaxed fit has a casual comfort and room to layer
name: Kathmandu CO-Z High Pile Pullover - Men's
